Mark Robinson Quote: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
Terrible Person Quote: I have nothing to declare except my genius. - Oscar Wilde

Mark Robinson Quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Terrible Person Quote: I don't care about what people think about me, as long as they think about me. - Andy Warhol

Mark Robinson Quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Terrible Person Quote: I have never seen a thin person drinking Diet Coke. - Donald Trump

Mark Robinson Quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
Terrible Person Quote: I'm not a dictator. It's just that I have a grumpy face. - Kim Jong-un

Mark Robinson Quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Terrible Person Quote: I'm not a psychopath, I'm a high-functioning sociopath. - Sherlock Holmes
